Notes.Text:
This update for strongswan fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-41913: Fixed a bug in charon-tkm related to handling DH public values that can lead to remote code execution (bsc#1216901).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: strongSwan before 5.9.12 has a buffer overflow and possible unauthenticated remote code execution via a DH public value that exceeds the internal buffer in charon-tkm's DH proxy. The earliest affected version is 5.3.0. An attack can occur via a crafted IKE_SA_INIT message.
